headline: Is Citizens Financial Group (CFG) the Best Local Bank Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Local Bank Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) stands against the other best local bank stocks. A report by PwC predicts a revival in the US banking industry due to a pro-business policy […]
